Lyric:
[by:G鈎哥]
[ti:DREAMCATCHER]
[ar:ナノ]
[al:DREAMCATCHER【アニメver.】]
[00:00.420]Do you see the light ahead？
[00:06.340]Will you face the night ahead？
[00:11.700]So far away, so far away(shining ray)
[00:14.980]Forever, so far away(arising)
[00:17.210]So far away, so far away(find the way)
[00:19.890]Forever, so far away(awakening)
[00:22.520]遠くの夜明けを見つめる瞳は希望に溢れた
[00:27.870]広がる暗闇のキャンバスに輝く虹を描いた
[00:33.080]LONG WAY ただ一途の
[00:36.020]NEW DAY ただ一つの
[00:38.380]運命 貫いて ただ夢追い続けた
[00:43.030]This night, the stars will set your heart free
[00:48.250]Have faith, let the whole world know what you see
[00:53.270]走り出す心が今迷わず進むように
[00:59.410]どこまでも道を行く
[01:03.530]Beyond the night, a miracle is waiting
[01:09.560]Believe in the fantasies unfolding
[01:14.660]求める未来がずっと色褪せないように
[01:20.760]いつまでも駆け抜ける
[01:24.320]A dream beginning
[01:28.060]
[01:47.200]The more I try to beat reality
[01:50.170]The more I'm losing to the weakness in me escaping
[01:53.160]I couldn't see where the today would take me
[01:55.790]Just waiting for tomorrow to ease the pain
[01:58.590]閉ざした記憶の狭間に潜んだ優しさに触れた
[02:03.900]流れる瞬く光に重ねた思い出の欠片
[02:09.100]どうやって歩んで来たって 間違いは無いと信じて
[02:14.480]どんな深い悲しみだって いつか癒えるはず
[02:19.310]This night, the stars will set your heart free
[02:24.290]Have faith, let the whole world know what you see
[02:29.480]離れた思いがきっと繋がっていくように
[02:35.450]その手を離さないでゆく
[02:39.570]Beyond the night, a miracle is waiting
[02:45.530]Believe in the fantasies unfolding
[02:50.760]限りない奇跡がいつか叶っていくように
[02:56.840]その目を逸らさないでゆく
[03:00.730]A dream beginning
[03:04.020]
[03:06.250]Just keep believing
[03:29.210]
